Can you please make this two separate commits, one that reverts the revert, and another that fixes the bugs?  Otherwise, it's impossible for me to review only the incremental changes.

Will do. The revert commit only has the revert. I haven't pushed up the fix yet, I think github auto asked for a review. I will ping this PR when the fix is pushed. 

Most of the fix will be occurring internally
